attributes.action: abolishish the posts of nurse practitioners and specialist nursing staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is proposed that the abolishment of these highly paid staff are of very little usage to the nursing staff  and interfere with the hands on personal care given by carers.The salaries from such posts would be better spent in a better longer training eg;4yrs for potential nursing staff to incorporate these areas into everyday working practices.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
